New-York Historical Society
Alfonso Varrecchia passport AHMC-Varrecchia
0.01 Linear feet (1 folder)
1950-1951 Italian passport issued to Alfonso Varrecchia (1894-1968) for travel to the United States, valid 20 July 1950 through 19 July 1951. Includes Varrecchia's photograph and vital statistics. For more information and to request this item, see the catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
